==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|こう|てい|へい|か|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=こうていへいか}} compound {{m|zh|皇帝|tr=hwang tej<sup>H</sup>|lit=emperor + emperor}} + {{m|zh|陛下|tr=biei hæ<sup>X</sup>|lit=throne + under}}, with a compound meaning of “emperor of everything under the throne”.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|こうてい へいか|acc=5}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こうてい へいか|hhira=くわうていへいか}}

# [[imperial]] [[majesty]]

====Usage notes====
As a title or term of reference, the term {{m|ja|天皇陛下|tr=tennō heika}} is much more common.

[[zh:皇帝陛下]]
